biotools.summary: SITEHOUND-web is a server that identifies ligand binding sites in protein structures. Users input a protein structure in PDB format. The program identifies putative ligand binding sites for various favorable probe molecules (i.e. carbon probe, phosphate probe) and displays the putative sites in interactive 3D representation.

bioschemas.name: SITEHOUND-web
